alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 3:05PM EDT until April 06 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, northeast, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 11 AM Wednesday to 5 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While patchy freezing drizzle could develop by mid day on Wednesday, the steadiest freezing rain is expected during the late afternoon into evening hours. Temperatures are expected to rise above freezing around midnight, with sub- freezing conditions lingering the longest near and along the Connecticut River valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Windsor
